pages.text: Meditation is a highly beneficial exercise, which can improve both the physical and the mental health of a person. $(br)However, to fully reach the potential of meditation, one might have to break boundaries, as in slaying the $(marked)Silver Thread$().

To perform meditation, one must simply sleep in a Bed, at any given time. This will normally cause a boost in health and Magan regeneration. $(br)However, meditation might also move deeper sentiments, given the right influences... This influence being $(marked)intoxication$(), with the best way of achieving it being $(l:alchemy/entry_tincture)Arcane Tincture$(). $(br)These extremely amplified emotions have different effects.

$(l)Contentment$()$(br)This emotion will, like almost every other emotion, increase the Magan regeneration. It will also increase the jump height, and the walk and mining speed. $(br2)$(l)Dread$()$(br)Dread causes a slightly higher Magan regeneration than Contentment. However, it provokes bad luck and weakness, though it grants slight protection.

$(l)Ecstasy$()$(br)This emotion fuels the cultist with desire, even thriving in their body's health, though the weakest desire brings no benefits to Magan regeneration at all. For this, a greater power of ecstasy might be required. $(br2)$(l)Fear$()$(br)Fear will set the cultist in a constant state of insecurity, increasing their capabilities in fleeing, but never helping with Magan regeneration.

$(l)Laughter$()$(br)While not being an emotion in the traditional sense, this sentiment is completely unstoppable, until it ceases on its own. It will immensely increase the regeneration of Magan.$(br2)$(l)Silence$()$(br)Not really being the opposite of laughter, but not really being anything in general, this emotion will prevent all Magan regeneration, but will increase strength and resistance.

The probability of one of these being applied may be manipulated with certain means, like special $(marked)perfumes$(). However, one can only obtain emotions by meditation when intoxicated, and this counts always.
